performance_metrics.name: Brew Time (Single Cup)
performance_metrics.description: Time from water heating initiation to completion of brewing cycle for a single cup (150ml - 200ml).  This includes heating, saturation, and drip time.  Lower times generally indicate faster brewing but can impact extraction quality.

performance_metrics.name: Brew Time (Batch - 1 Liter)
performance_metrics.description: Time from water heating initiation to completion of brewing cycle for a 1-liter batch. Accounts for full saturation and drip time.

performance_metrics.name: Extraction Yield (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of soluble compounds extracted from the coffee grounds during the brewing process.  Higher yields generally correlate with stronger flavor profiles, but excessive extraction can lead to bitterness.

performance_metrics.name: Temperature Stability (°C)
performance_metrics.description: Deviation of the water temperature from the setpoint during the brewing cycle. Maintaining consistent temperature is crucial for consistent extraction.

performance_metrics.name: Pressure (Bar)
performance_metrics.description: Pressure applied during the brewing process, particularly relevant for pressurized systems. Influences water flow rate and extraction efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Coffee-to-Water Ratio (g/ml)
performance_metrics.description: Standard ratio for optimal extraction.  Adjustments may be made based on coffee bean type and desired flavor profile.

performance_metrics.name: Water Quality (TDS - ppm)
performance_metrics.description: Total Dissolved Solids in the water.  Excessively high TDS can negatively impact flavor.  Filtered water is highly recommended.

implementation_requirements.name: Water Heating System
implementation_requirements.specification: Electric heating element with PID control for precise temperature regulation. Minimum 3kW power output.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures rapid and accurate water temperature control.

implementation_requirements.name: Pump System
implementation_requirements.specification: Stainless steel diaphragm pump with variable speed control. Flow rate: 3-6 L/min.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides consistent water flow for efficient brewing.

implementation_requirements.name: Brew Chamber
implementation_requirements.specification: Borosilicate glass or stainless steel chamber with a surface area of 0.2-0.4 m².
implementation_requirements.description: Maximizes water contact with the coffee grounds.

implementation_requirements.name: Filtration System
implementation_requirements.specification: Multi-stage filtration system (e.g., mesh filter, paper filter, activated carbon filter).
implementation_requirements.description: Removes coffee grounds and impurities from the brewed coffee.

implementation_requirements.name: Control Panel
implementation_requirements.specification: Touchscreen interface with programmable brewing profiles and real-time monitoring.
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for easy operation and customization of brewing parameters.

implementation_requirements.name: Cleaning System
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated backflushing system for the pump and filter system.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures consistent hygiene and prevents clogging.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
operational_considerations: Water Source Quality: Consistent and high-quality water is paramount.
Coffee Bean Storage: Proper storage (temperature, humidity, light) is crucial for maintaining bean freshness.
Grind Size Adjustment: Regular adjustment of grind size based on coffee bean type and desired extraction.
Maintenance Schedule: Implement a preventative maintenance program for all equipment.
Cleaning Protocols: Adhere to strict cleaning protocols to prevent contamination and ensure hygiene.
Waste Management: Implement a system for managing coffee grounds and water waste.
